sourcesContent:
export const Product = (props) => { const productData = props.productData; return (

{productData.name}

{Number(productData.reviews) > 0 ? "★".repeat(productData.reviews) : "☆".repeat(5)}

Key Features

- {productData.keyFeatures[0]}
- {productData.keyFeatures[1]}
- {productData.keyFeatures[2]}
- {productData.keyFeatures[3]}

{productData.availability === "CS" ? "Coming Soon!" : `Est. Delivery ${productData.availability} days`}

{productData.toString().replace(/\B(?=(\d{3})+(?!\d))/g, ",")} .00

); };
